title: Elo Hell
body: This elo hell is starting to get really annoying and basically impossible to climb out of. Riot needs to do something so that elo hell isn't a thing.

If Elo Hell exists, than Elo Boosting would never work.
However, Elo Boosting does work. 

This implies that the Statement. Elo Hell exists is False.

Therefore, Git Gud.

Statement: Elo Hell exists.

We define Elo Hell as a segment of the ranked ladder that is hard to climb (opposed to Elo Heaven, a segment of ranked ladder that is easy to climb).
Therefore:
Elo Hell can be located anywhere starting from your actual skill level and ending to the top of the ladder.
Elo Heaven can be located anywhere starting from your actual skill level and ending to the bottom of the ladder.

Therefore,
if you wanna get out, just drop in rating.
